name: ssort
description: The program should sort the array a in nondecreasing order.
precondition: 0 < N && n = N && (A qi : 0 <= qi < N : a[qi] = A[qi])
invariants: n = N && perm(a,A,N) && 0 <= i < N-1 && i <= j <= N && i <= imin < N && (A qi : i <= qi < j : a[imin] <= a[qi]) && (A qi : 0 <= qi < i-1 : a[qi] <= a[qi+1]) && (i > 0 => (A qi : i <= qi < N : a[i-1] <= a[qi]))
